EmailTemplate.name: Request Electric Bill
EmailTemplate.subject: Direct Energy Solar: See what's next!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
It was great talking to you today about Direct Energy Solar and how you might qualify for our free installation to take control of unpredictable electricity bills. Thanks for taking the time to learn about us and how you can become your own energy provider.
Please use this e-mail address to send me a copy of your latest electric bill. Below are some options for sending a copy of your bill in:
• If you have on-line access to your account, you can save a copy of your bill on your computer, usually as an Adobe pdf. You can then e-mail this copy attached to the reply to me.
• If you don’t have on-line access, you can scan a paper copy of your bill and attach the scanned image or pdf to the reply to me.
• Should neither of these options work for you then you can fax a copy to (800) 949-1408. Please make sure you write my name on the first page of the fax, so I may identify it.
As our next step, I’ve contacted the Direct Energy Solar coordinator in your area, who will schedule a survey of your roof and home site by our home solar professionals so we can start tailoring your Direct Energy Solar system. You do not have to be home for this survey. The System Design Specialist will take care of everything and will inform you before they come to visit, just to remind you.
Congratulations on taking this first step toward becoming energy independent!
Again, thanks for your time and your interest in Direct Energy Solar!
Best regards, {!User.FirstName} 7101 Riverwood Drive Columbia, MD 21046 P: 800-903-6130 F: 800-949-1408 directenergysolar.com
Offers and financing are available to customers who qualify, vary by location, and are not available in all areas. We customize our solar power system specifically for your home, therefore, pricing, savings, utility bill, solar bill amounts and actual returns vary based on different factors including but not limited to your location, system size, available solar incentives and local utility rates. See terms and conditions for more details.
